message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $20,000. I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
Alice, $20,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product but I can only offer $12,000 right now. What do you think?
I understand you're interested in the product, Bob, but $12,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $17,500. This is my best price for now.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $17,500 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $14,000.  This is my final offer.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14,000. I'm willing to compromise at $16,000, but that's my final offer for now.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $15,000, which is my absolute final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $15,000. I'm willing to meet you at $16,250, which is my final offer for now.
